website_summaries.verdict: An affordable product that makes it easy to achieve the results you prefer.
pros: Can lighten your hair up to nine levels – without that bleach-y smell
Easy to control brassy tones if you prefer platinum or ash blonde color
cons: Your head will get warm as the bleach settles in
Some reports of damaged packaging upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: It works like magic. Also my skin was not irritated at ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is a magic! Turns my black hair in platinum in one bleach! The bleach can turn very hot with shower cap on, so don't cover your hair if you are using this product. It works like magic. Also my skin was not irritated at all using this product, which happens with quick blue. Also, somehow this product fixed my fried hair from previous bleaches with quick blue (I bleached my black hair with quick blue 7 times to reach level 9, whereas blonde me lifts my hair to level 10 in one bleach). Strongly recommended for people who are going grey. Also, recommend using pravana silver as a magic combo for going grey.
customer_reviews.author: keqing

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! So I only did my roots but the results were great. I used 20 vol developer (not schwarzkopf developer, just a generic) and left it on about 30 minutes. Then used a blow dryer on low heat on the side that had the bleach on the shortest amount of time to make sure both sides came out the same. I also toned it for only a couple minutes. I had no hair loss and no feeling of britleness/damage.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by professional stylists
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is super powerful and I highly recommend using the Schwartzkopf brand peroxide in a low volume. If you want to get to platinum without the brass, this is the way to go. If you use it with olaplex use 10 vol higher than what you would normally use. This pic was right after using it on level 6 hair.
customer_reviews.author: Moto mom

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Left it on for 45 mins and got the color I wanted! I was blonde prior, but it was not as bright. I was bleaching my dark brown roots and it looks perfect now!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Use this powder only!!  Nothing else works as well
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this! I’ve tried the L’Oréal and Wella and Clarol throughout the last 10 years, and none really worked like this one. I usually comes out ramen yellow, scary af. But this one!! Actually turned my black hair BLONDE! If it’s virgin black hair it will be a bit organge, but you can fix with second bleach. If you have brown, prepare to have PLATINUM BLOND HAIR! By first try! It is amazing, I’ve never had such good results! And it’s only a couple dollars more than L’Oréal it does magic!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L.

customer_reviews.title: Found my new go to bleach!
customer_reviews.text: In love with this bleach! Before I had been using L’Oréal quick blue from Sally’s and 40V developer and would always get a yellow band right at my scalp, it never pulled to a 9/10. With this bleach and blondeme 30V devolved and Olaplex, not only is my hair platinum but it feels like healthy hair! Normally after I bleach and tone it feels like straw for the first week or so. Processing time for me was 45 minutes, followed by toning with Wells T18 and T14, 1:1 ratio. It looks a little yellow in the after picture but trust me this is white!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best!!!! 2 applications, and the second was just to get those stubborn patches. Minimal hair damage and very little scalp irritation, and that was with 30 developer, also blondeme. This took me from a 2 to a 10. And...I had blue in the bangs Never will I buy another product again! This is it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Brought me from dark brown to a beautiful blonde. Will add before and after pictures. I used this with the matching developing creamer and ice toner
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had such high hopes for this product. I will definitely be going back to my quick blue. This dried my hair out really bad and didn’t pull as well, left it very yellow and I had to wash it out after 35 min because my scalp burned, which never happens. I always mix 20 & 30 vol 50/50 and have never had burning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many bleach product but they were damaging and not as sufficient. My hair was really damaged, I bleached it twice with 20 Vol (same brand), for 10 minutes and I reached YELLOW Which is great because my hair was red/orange. My hair didn't fall off or break. I added Olaplex, if it's worth mentioning.
customer_reviews.author: Shera ♡

customer_reviews.title: Use with developer for this product not a Sally’s one!!!
customer_reviews.text: I HIGHLY recommend u use this bleach with its developer!! I used a Sally’s developer with it and it BURNED me chemically. I now have sores on my head and they leak the bleach worked amazing and started to work almost immediately but after reading the reviews I should’ve used with the same developer
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!  Love this but the lid doesn't close after open it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! I have very curly freezy hair as you see on my pics and this thing was amazing, I only left it for 8 minutes, because I didn't want to get to much damage. It's amazing and the smell it smells pretty good compare to other bleach I have done my self and got done at salons. No overpowering smell at all. Like any other bleach, make sure your hair is healthy and strong enough before applying any bleach. My before and after pictures are included in this review, only 8 minutes and I went from copper red to yellow tone hair.
customer_reviews.author: sash.

customer_reviews.title: The best bleach I have used so far.
customer_reviews.text: Used it with a pull through cap to touch up my highlights. Lifted quick, about 25 minutes. Some breakage on the already highlighted pieces but very minimal as compared to quick blue or the other bleaches from Sally's. I used with the matching 20 volume blondme developer. It also washes out very nice and didnt leave my hair as dry as other bleach/developers. I toned my hair with wella T18 afterwards, but it honestly didnt need much toning. This is good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Edeen

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy!
customer_reviews.text: No damage, already have level 6 haircolor, so using this is a no-brainer. Remember to deep condition after using, and continue to do so for the life of your lightened tresses. If you use this and end up with damage, it's possible you left it on too long, or your hair was already partially damaged. As a rule, I tend to strand test any new product to guage the amount of time to leave it on.
customer_reviews.author: A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting. Customer service keeps sending me emails to write a review. If I have any issues I'm suppose to email them back. That's a joke. Everytime I email them I get a automated response back saying they are closed on the weekends. Didn't know tuesday and Thursday's were weekends. So I'm leaving a review like they wanted me to. Just won't be the 5 stars they want. The powder and developer were not all that great. Didn't do the 9 levels and my hair is already light and I still didn't get the platinum blonde. My hair is orange and I used toner. So I'll just stick to my normal bleach and not buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Nikki D.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I did my research and this bleach seemed to be the best. I bleached my hair for the first time yesterday using this and LOVED it! My hair was softer AFTER using this! So crazy! It lifted my hair quick and it worked perfectly. Of course it turned my hair orangey but that is normal. First picture is before toner, second picture is after. I used Wella Color Charm T11 for my toner. Could not love this bleach more!
customer_reviews.author: Summer Liston

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I have been doing my hair myself for some time now, and just recently thought I would try to bleach/lighten it with this. Normally I purchase blonde dye or I buy the Frost and Glow package. But in the long run this saves money. BEWARE! It lightens your hair REALLY fast. The 20 Vol. toner does as well. So like I said, beware. I was not really allergic, but it did burn my finger. Do a test strand first because it is strong. But, surprisingly my hair was left undamaged. (or damaged very little)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 💯
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how amazing this product is!! I've tried many bleach products in the past and they all fried my hair... leaving it orange/ brassy no matter how many treatments I did... This product was a two time use with no hair damage and smells amazing! Also, the shipping was faster than expected (always a plus)😍😍 If you want salon blonde without the $$$ cost, I highly recommend trying this product first! 💖
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Payton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I had to bleach my hair twice to get it platinum and this stuff did not fry my hair! 🙌🏻🙌🏻🙌🏻 Super creamy, not clumpy and chalky like other bleach powders. I used this with the blondMe oil developer, great combo!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany C.

customer_reviews.title: Hands down best bleach
customer_reviews.text: I am a licensed cosmetologist and this is my absolute favorite decolorizer. Smells amazing, nice texture, a little goes a long way. And it lifts very well. I can get a lot of my clients white along with using a good toner with this.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Markvicka

customer_reviews.title: High quality bleach
customer_reviews.text: This bleach is outstanding! I would like like to suggest to purchase not olaplex but allplex 1 and 2 mix it in with this. Then use the all plex 2 times a week. I went to get my hair cut the day after bleaching jet black hair to red and my hair dresser could not believe I had just bleached it. Very minimal damage.
customer_reviews.author: Rastamomma

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t really burn my scalp and my hair ended up pretty soft in the end. Then again I tried to avoid my roots a bit so it could give my hair some depth. I also used it with the 30% developer from the same company. I went from Asian black to a platinum blonde in two sessions. The first time I did it though I was more of a yellow blonde if that’s what you’re looking for. (Color is from overtone pastel grey)
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi

customer_reviews.title: The best bleach I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: Professional and convenient packaging. Pleasant smell and no dust. Lift much more powerful than L’Oréal Quick Blue or other bleach. It took only 30-35 mint (with 30% developer) to lift my thick black hair to level 7ish blonde, saving me time and especially the fear of doing a second bleach (which will definitely weaken my hair). The soft brush that comes with this set (bleach & developer) is even of higher quality than the 5$ 4-star brush I bought on amazon. Very happy with the experience and result.
customer_reviews.author: Nga

customer_reviews.title: Will lighten 9 levels but may cause severe hair damage
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I have very dark brown hair and it did the job. Just a warning though. It definantly can cause some damage to your hair so make sure you cut it after but as far as color goes, this product definantly lightened my hair 9 levels.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: Just amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! It worked soo well I’ve used wella L’Oréal white out so many other types and they all have left my hair brassy and damaged no matter how many times it they just wouldn’t lighten past a 7 even after processing twice With this 1 time and my hair was a 9/10 on the brassy mess wella left I am impressed my hair doesn’t feel corse or nasty still nice and soft! The best hands down and I only used the 20% volume blind me developer and still amazing! And the smell is amazing it doesn’t smell like pure chemicals like other brands very tolerable
customer_reviews.author: Saragon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Let me preface this: I am Asian. Regular box bleach normally turns my hair ginger. This got my hair from a really dark brown/black to a level 7 in one bleach (a total of an hour). My tips are slightly ginger, but that's mostly because my tips didn't take the bleach as well. I toned with Wella T18 and now I'm pretty blonde. This lightens well, smells pretty good (for hair bleach), and I still have powder left (after doing both my hair and my friend's - and we both have pretty thick hair!) Overall a good quarantine hair decision.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made my hair break off in chunks
customer_reviews.text: While this is an amazing product and really good quality, It gets less than a star for me because it made my hair completely break off in massive chunks and fried the rest. I used the blond me developer, powder and toner (which is a useless product). I hadn’t even finished putting the bleach all over my hair when I checked a strand and my hair pulled right off at the ends. Incredibly unhappy and it’s going to take me ages now to recover my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: From yellow to beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used another product in the hopes of achieving the beautiful light blond shade she’s been dreaming of her whole life. As seen in the before picture, what she got was orangey-yellow hair that was pretty dried out. We bought the BlondeMe products and tried again. This time, the mixture was smooth and practically odorless. Her hair turned into the shade she wanted and it is shiny and healthy looking. I will be using these products for all of my bleaching needs in the future. We used this powder, the 20 developer and the ice toner.
customer_reviews.author: Christi H

customer_reviews.title: Great bleach, BUT BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Ya'll, this IS the bleach to get but PLEASE be careful. Over processed my hair and is breaking off left and right. If you are NOT a professonal, do your research. I did mine and thought I had it under control, even with only using blonde me 20 developer and bleaching my hair only twice. Be so incredibly careful. Buy hair masks, oils, heat protector, high end shampoos like olaplex 6 and pureology ahead of time.
customer_reviews.author: Solt

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the results with this product. Easy to use, quick processing time. If you have a lot of hair like me mix small batches for each section. The product works best (as stated on the container) to use right away. Like this product and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Burrup

customer_reviews.title: This one goes out to my Asian peeps with stubborn dark hair!
customer_reviews.text: I’m almost out of this product and I love it! I’m Asian and the dark pigment on my hair is really hard to remove! If it’s virgin hair, I recommend using it with the 40 V! Prior to using this product I used the L’Oréal blue from Sally w/ 30 V three times and just got to about a yellow orange so then I decided to try out this product. Used it once and got to a level 8/9 on the hair color lifting scale. Finally some success!! I just bought more and highly recommended this for my Asian peeps looking to bleach their hair!
customer_reviews.author: Christ

customer_reviews.title: Quality lightening powder!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this bleach powder. I have a nightmare of hair. Box color. Permanent color. Damaged. Dry. Sad. It’s currently a faded permanent brassy brown color. I foiled in some highlights yesterday on my hair, and this product mixed with 30 developer lifted my hair to a PALE bright blonde!!! The only brassiness is because I am not a professional and I didn’t coat all the hair strands. Definitely and at home color job. But this product performed like a champ. I will ONLY be buying this for my highlighting going forward. Lots of lift, barely needed any toner, did not break my hair, worked fast. I’m super happy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Great product for professionals
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I was a able to take my dyed black hair to bleach blond in two cycles. I would suggest working in steps with this product because as with this and any bleach it damages your hair and you want to give it time to heal overall great product but it is NOT for beginners. You do need to get a developer and toner as well.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bleach I've used so far as far as least damaging and best lift. I had my hair dyed"dark brown" which came out more like black. Way too dark for my Irish complexion so I figured I'd throw a few highlights in to break up the color a little bit. I only left this on for 15 minutes and it already lifted to a nice honeyish blond . I used it with the recommended 30 developer. If I were to want to go blond ( which I can't due to fragile hair) I would definitely use this.
customer_reviews.author: sarah pesce

customer_reviews.title: Best Bleach I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the best bleach I have ever used, combined with 30 developer from the same brand and my hair lifted so beautifully without the intense burning that some other brands have, and the scent wasn’t bad either! My natural hair is about a level 4 very dark brown and my hair lifted to a level 10+ white platinum blonde in 2 sessions(I could’ve done it in one, but I like to let my hair rest with a mask in between for minimal damage, plus you just never know when trying new products). Very highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Use both developer blondme with it
customer_reviews.text: Wow I'm impressed never has my hair been this blonde I've used everything and just wow
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This amazing bleach is my favorite one. I use it to bleach my hair and it is super !!!!! I love the way the color is not yellow before the toner and the way it protects my hair. Being a bleach itself it can damage your hair if you don’t properly take care of your scalp or hair , but other than that I highly recommend it !
customer_reviews.author: Lisbet

customer_reviews.title: DARK hair? This stuff is the BEST I have tried over my 20 years as a Cosmetologist!
customer_reviews.text: Have tried so many brands but this is hands down the quickest &best to lighten Asian dark almost black hair! No heat needed & doesn't break hardly even tho I use it with the 40 vol. developer & cover my head with plastic bag or cap to accelerate after I apply all over! I know that's bad but I'm in a rush & THIS DOES THE JOB!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniellabellacinderella

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Best bleach ever.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Smells like roses and when used with the developer gives the most beautiful icy platinum blonde color. I had bought a toner too but I don’t even need it. I also experienced no hair breakage which is unusual when I bleach my hair. The reviews that say it fried their hair must have used to high volume developer. I used 20 volume for 30 minutes and got lifted to a level 10 or higher if that’s possible. Perfect white blonde hair. No brassiness.
customer_reviews.author: Helga Frost

customer_reviews.title: Best bleach I have found.
customer_reviews.text: I've been bleaching and dying my hair for 5-6 years by myself. I had a few colors none of my regular bleaches would lift. So I found this and decided to try it. This stuff is a miracle. It smells like a floral scent. Not your regular eye burning smelly chemical bleach. It goes on very smooth. It is very harsh obviously. Some of my hair felt like gum but I've also bleached my hair over 10 times so thats my fault not the bleach. It took permanent black and a red stain out of my hair in 25 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I left it on for the recommend time, I mix it with the recommend products... and I fried my hair. My hair was literally falling out in clump! I would say that I lost more than half my hair.
customer_reviews.author: DIANNA W.

customer_reviews.title: Wow! I lifted virgin black hair to a 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I lifted virgin black hair to a 6 without any damage or irritation. I used Wella 20 developer and placed it on for 30 minutes and air dried. I've also used this to do my own foiled highlights, and it's worked very well (I paired with wella T18 toner right after for ashy blonde highlights).
customer_reviews.author: Sg00

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Gentle and easy to use, WAY better tham the bleach you get at Sally's, trust me i have used every brand of otc bleach, it always fries my hair. My hair actually fwlt soft with this salon grade bleach and it lifts well.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Smith

customer_reviews.title: Honestly I was quite scared because it was my first time ever doing bleach and heard a lot of bad things like buring the skin and hair damage
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for my niece who has real black hair. Honestly I was quite scared because it was my first time ever doing bleach and heard a lot of bad things like buring the skin and hair damage. But this product was super easy to handle and did its wonder like other reviews said. My niece needed 3 sessions to get the color she wanted. Probably because this was my very first time to try but my point is - her hair was not damaged almost at all though we did it every other day. I know no one should and would do it... Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeong-im Yi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lightening with NO scalp irritation!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after my hair stylist told me it was her go-to product for people with sensitive scalps. Well, she was right! I used this (really undusty!! 👍🏼) powder with the Blonde Me 20volume developer, and had no burning, no scalp irritation, and 25 minutes took the hair from medium brown to lemon yellow and ready for toner. I will never use any other bleach again!
customer_reviews.author: BarbMama

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as I had believed from the reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes from the reviews, but this actually damaged my hair more and didn’t lift any better than quick blue from Sally’s. Smells nice though.. didn’t get hot, but it did bother the skin on my neck if it sat for a bit. I did not use it on my scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I used this bleach with the same developer and love the results. Its definitely worth the money versus using something cheaper. Firstly, I want to say that my hair was an ombre of brown and red. I am extremely shocked that my brown hair lifted to a blonde color and that the most of the red turned into a lighter pink. This is all after 1 round of bleach that stayed on for 20 minutes. I will be doing another round in two weeks and definitely give an update!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite bleach. I will NEVER use another one. The scent is not strong, it bleaches my hair BLONDE from black!!! I did it 2 times to get that color
customer_reviews.author: Seo

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy any other
customer_reviews.text: Really great hair bleach! Wish I had had more experience before using it would have been able to save more product as I used almost the entire container to bleach my hair to white/silver from dark almost black brown in just a week or two.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Hashtag Quarantine Hair Approved
customer_reviews.text: Quarantine hair is not a game people. Got stir crazy in the house and convinced my sister to let me bleach her hair. I bought some Clairol bleach originally, and after an hour her hair was orange and we were completely out of bleach. I was not deterred. Did a little research and found this stuff and WOW - the developer plus the bleach is a world of difference. Her hair lifted so much faster and it was much kinder on her hair than the cheaper stuff. It’s on the pricey side, and if you have a lot of hair like my sister, you’ll end up using the whole tub. It was worth it for the results though!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn T.

customer_reviews.title: love love love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this in combination with the Schwarzkopf Professional BLONDE ME DEVELOPER Oil Formula. Best bleaching experience I have ever had. I have natural medium to dark brown hair and it lifted it to a very light blonde without orange / red tinting left. I haven't felt the need to use a toner yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn E. Frie

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: This didn't do anything except make my hair really dry. I used a Bleach from Sally and it worked good-but kinda orange. So I thought I would use this a couple of weeks later to finish the process. After so many good reviews, I thought it would be good. It has damaged my hair and its still orange. Waste of money!! Like others have said, do a strand test first.
customer_reviews.author: L B

customer_reviews.title: Best product for achieving platinum hair.
customer_reviews.text: This is THE best lightning powder on the market. I constantly dye my hair between red and blonde. This powder will lift the red fully out of my hair, leaving me with the platinum blonde color I desire. This is the only product that I am able to achieve this with.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy2gr8kids

customer_reviews.title: Lifted without damage!
customer_reviews.text: This formula worked perfectly to take my hair from copper to platinum while paired with the 20% vol matching developer. I followed up with the BlondeMe toning in Ice for a clean, white platinum. My hair felt soft after lightening and I don't feel like I fried my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Xandyr

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Tried it, liked it very much, beautiful (not brassy) results. Best I've had doing my highlight at home, which Ive done for years and tried several products always with some slight grassiness which required toner. This was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Maple1

customer_reviews.title: Powerful lightener
customer_reviews.text: This has become my go to lightener recently; the hair will lighten pretty fast so be careful. My hair is typically built up with black dyes and this lightener managed to bring my ends roundabout lvl 7/8 in only ten mins. I have not used it with the dedicated developer so I cannot attest to the bond building, but as long as you're careful when lightening I haven't seen much damage from the lightener itself. Hopefully this helps 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Pretty amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty amazing product. Make sure you soak your hair in coconut at least a hour before bleaching and please don't go over a 40 developer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!! Read below!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit pricey but honestly I can say this is worth it. I used this on a few inches of overgrown ombré grown out to get an even blonde and it did exactly what I needed it to do. I used 20vol and let it do it’s thing under a plastic cap for 30 minutes. I was pretty blown away with how nicely it lightened and the scent was a big one for me because everyone knows how strong some lighteners can be and it wasn’t the case here. I followed up with the blondeme toner in ice.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase this item again but perhaps choose an different seller and the container was pretty beaten up
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a Level 9 lift, no unpleasant odor, leaves hair softer than a competing pro line ...Would purchase this item again but perhaps choose an different seller and the container was pretty beaten up...It is a premium blonding experience.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Maven

customer_reviews.title: Not brassy higher lift
customer_reviews.text: Great! I have used a lot of bleach in my years and this gets you a higher lift without the damage and tones too
customer_reviews.author: Shawny B

customer_reviews.title: Definately purchase this again
customer_reviews.text: I do my hair by myself for 3 years and I started to use this about a year ago. Smell of this is way better than any other bleach that I've ever tried. Way less pain and absolute color. I bleach my roots every 1 or 2 months and I absolutely satisfy with color.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I used this with their 30 volume developer to lift my level 2 hair (with layers of black and brown hair dye packed in) to about a level 7/8 in under 30 minutes. My hair feels minimally damaged and it lifted to a golden color - not orange - which was perfect for the medium blonde shade I wanted to go. The bond enforcing and neutralizing claims of this product are true!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Would definitely buy this again! The size is worth the money and it took my hair from dark brown to level 10 blonde in 1 application. It also didn’t damage my hair like other brands of bleach have in the past. If your thinking about buying this, DO IT. You won’t regret it :)
customer_reviews.author: kelsie

customer_reviews.title: No damage at all.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for bleach my hair and I combined with the developed 20 volumes maybe if you want a really platinum color you need to use 30 volumes water , I went from an ugly orange (previously bleached) to an a decent color.
customer_reviews.author: Yenny Pena

customer_reviews.title: Best lightener on the market!
customer_reviews.text: If you want extreme lift, this product will do it! Doesn’t really have a harsh smell compared to other lighteners Purchased more than once Will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: CeeKay

customer_reviews.title: Great smelling bkeach (if thats possible) with great lift!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time after using another powdered bleach. This gave me the life i needed and it has a pleasant smell! My hair didnt break off either. I use Olaplex system when bleaching hair and though it says not to use a bonding product with bleach, i did. I love this bleach and will use in the future!
customer_reviews.author: L. Mengucci

customer_reviews.title: Switching to this lightener from now on.
customer_reviews.text: Lightens very well. when I use this over the cheaper bleach at Sally’s, my hair feels less dry and I get better lift. And it’s a great price for how much you get! I’ve had the same fun for over a year and I still have like half left (I only touch up my roots every 6 weeks). I only have to use 20 volume developer (I use the cheap one from Sally’s) and I get an almost white shade perfect for toner. I’d like to try the developer too, I bet it’s even better.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cohen

customer_reviews.title: I am not an expert, and this product rocks
customer_reviews.text: I experimented and wow, it is amazing. My hair is not all nasty like with the cheap powder from the store. I am in love!!! I used the ice toner
customer_reviews.author: Natisly

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not like the way my hair became very thin and brittle. I used the product as recommended and my super thick hair is now as thin as my 5-year-olds
customer_reviews.author: 24/7 cosplay mommy

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great!
customer_reviews.text: First time bleaching my hair myself and this stuff was awesome. Used it with the Blond Me 20 vol. developer. Was able to get my hair to a level 10 after the first bleach (started with about a level 8). Used coconut oil in my hair for extra protection. And didn’t have any breakage. Toned my hair with the Wella T11.
customer_reviews.author: Raegan

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: It’s not very good. Burns hair quick leaves with bad color I wouldn’t use again
customer_reviews.author: Rwi

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bleach
customer_reviews.text: Here’s a before and after photo. In just 25 minutes and after using the toner, my hair went from a medium brown to full blown blonde. My hair feels softer than before I started. I am suuuuuper pleased with this! 😍
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Busted container
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff but the container was busted and blue powder everywhere...
customer_reviews.author: Domenique

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it if you like bleaching
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the powder is super fine, it melts really well and evenly. Smells like rose Less painful on scalp This is absolutely the best bleach powder Only one thing that I don't like is the package. The case is weak so hard to cover it well
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. The smell was great and didn't bother me at all. Most bleaches make my nose burn, this one didn't. It didn't burn my scalp at all, either. I went from a medium brown (virgin hair) to a level 9 blonde in one use. No damage done. I even used it a 2nd time a week later for color correction (I did it myself and missed a spot or 2) and to lift to a level 10. Still no damage and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Yep. Best bleach I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: This lifted so much more than I thought. I did a bleach bath so not even full strength on my roots and they were definitely pretty yellow but I only left bleach bath on for like 15/20 minutes and it lifted at least 4 shades
customer_reviews.author: Amber Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Love this hair bleach
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works fast! It is one of the best hair bleaching powders out there. I used this when my hair was dyed black and it lightened it to an orange/red color within ten minutes or so. I will buy again as its the fastest I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Sabin

customer_reviews.title: It will not disappoint you
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is strong! But this is the only bleach that works the best on my hair. Only with this one I can achieve the platinum blonde color! Usually I leave it on my roots for 35-40 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get any better than this so far. Love this! Works better than any store bought and lifts higher levels. Leaves hair feeling way better than normal bought bleach.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Absolutley Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Had never bleached my own hair before but this did a fantastic job. I used the 30 volume developer from the same company. Left on for about 40 mins and went from a level 4 to a level 10 in one try. Also used the sand and steel blue toner with the 20 volume developer from this company and completely satisfied with the outcome. My hair did not have any artificial color so that probably helped with how quickly it lifted.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great lighter
customer_reviews.text: Workes great! Really lifted well with minimal damage. Used with a 40 developer. Bathroom pic with dark brown hair is right before coloring. Middle 2 with peachy shirt is after lifting. The last picture is after I used a toner. Really happy with my finished product.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany M

customer_reviews.title: Great bleach. Especially for dark to blonde
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bleach I’ve ever used. It lightened very well and kept my curls intact, (now I have inches of blonde curly hair and 60% straight blonde hair because I switched after using L’Oréal for years)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps me to be bomb-shell blonde.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but worth it. This product helps me take my level 3 (with gray) hair to platinum blonde without frying it. Be sure to use the developer with oil made by the manufacturer. Smells great. Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Marketing Professor in Connecticut

customer_reviews.title: Jar half empty
customer_reviews.text: My bond enforcing lightener literally just came in the mail and I am shocked to see the jar is half empty!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Go to hair bleach.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. Used with their volume 30 developer. I would recommend taking a small section of hair and testing the mixture to make sure your hair reacts well to it. Took me from black hair (box dyed) to strawberry blonde tips and platinum roots. It looks like a really pretty ombre. Definitely use hair masks and condition to add moisture back but for the most part it doesn't even feel like I bleached my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Stormy Christy

customer_reviews.title: Authentic
customer_reviews.text: Left hair in excellent condition and evenly bleached from root to tip. No brassy tones when left on hair for 50 minutes. This is my preferred lightener.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Went from near black to blonde!!
customer_reviews.text: My natural hair color is a very very dark brown, I’ve always had issues trying to lift it to get a lighter color. Within 30 minutes of processing, my hair lifted from a level 2-3 to a level 7 with minimal damage. The smell wasn’t overwhelming either. I used it with Schwarzkopf’s level 20 developer. For those of us with dark hair, I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Steph I

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY TRULY IS EVERYTHING IT STATES AND MORE
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable I don’t even need a toner this stuff is magic. Of course I will tone just to seal the color and make sure it’s even but this bleach is now my go to
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Gordon

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love! This pic is before toner! I double processed with a 20% developer. I used to use bleach from Sally's. Not anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Used today and was amazed with how nice everything came out
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this along with the 20 developer and ice toner. Used today and was amazed with how nice everything came out! Touched up my dark roots and toned. Usually the bleach won’t lift this easy and the toner won’t take to it (use to use T18)First time and amazed. Sold on these products!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Rosenburg

customer_reviews.title: impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I used another brand for years (box)... and decided to switch after following someone on IG who uses it on his clients. I was nervous at first but bought the bleach with the recommended developers. I had to bleach twice and then tone- but I am whiter than I have been before. I tried their toner with it, but a different color was delivered so I ran to Sallys to get t18 wella and with the previous brand, it went grey and with this bleach and developer I finally got that white I had tried to achieve for so many years. Very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago2170

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy? (I'm not a professional)
customer_reviews.text: I used this with the BLONDME volume 20 developer and it is such a gentle bleach, I also used this for a few bleach baths. My hair sustained a small amount of damage. I still have bleach powder left over. This is great for people who are constantly wanting a hair change. And remember to always leave a conditioner in your hair for a long while after chemically treating your hair!
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: best bleach money can buy
customer_reviews.text: i had layers upon layers of dark hair color in my hair and this bleach still lifted my hair to a dark golden blonde. the after picture is also before using any toners. i bought a dark ash blonde color to cancel out a lot of the golden orange tones
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Best bleach ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Best bleach ever! This takes my jet black, African American hair to a very light blonde with minimum fuss and damage. I've also used it on friends' Asian hair and it works equally well. Super glad I've discovered this!
customer_reviews.author: M. McGraw

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Blonde
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My blonde is so perfect with this powder. Smells amazing. Left my hair feeling super soft. I like whiter blonde on my crown and this delivers. I mixed with 40 Vol. from Sally’s and did foils around the front and just sort of brushed the rest toward the back. It came out awesome. Just don’t get it on your scalp or it will look blotchy. Love this
customer_reviews.author: Ashlo3

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product best beach I’ve used, leaves very little orange behind. Smell is not bad either, not powerful smell at all.
customer_reviews.author: Oceans...805

customer_reviews.title: Must purchase blondeme developer for results!!
customer_reviews.text: I literally have 1/4 of product left. I used almost the whole thing on 1 head of full hair. It lifted a level 1 to a bright blonde and i used generous amount of product. Must use with blondeme developer or it wont lift to its full ability. Just buy the developer and dont look back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Literally best bleach ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I made a huge mistake and dyed my virgin hair black. Then I really wanted blonde without spending a ton of money at the salon. This is the BEST bleach and it took 2 sessions over the course of a week to get it this blonde (and I used Olaplex 3). Love my hair! Buy this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!😎
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I change blond dye I absolutely love this. Never go back. And it doesn’t fry my hair to much!
customer_reviews.author: natalie conner

customer_reviews.title: I love the Blond Me line of Schwarzkopf products!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using this Premium Lift along with the 2% 7vol. Developer to maintain my dark blonde hair and it worked like a dream. Easy to mix, easy to apply. I've attached a photo of my dark blonde hair from one of my YouTube videos on Shawna Who. I'm a huge fan of the Schwarzkopf hair color products (I've used the Blond Me line and the Keratin Color line) and I've never been disappointed. I'm extremely happy that Amazon makes it so easy for me to get my hands on these Schwarzkopf products!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna WhoTop Contributor: Hair Coloring

product_meta.title: Schwarzkopf Professional Blond Me Premium Lift 9 - 15.8 oz
product_meta.description: Schwarzkopf Professional Blond Me Premium Lift 9 - 15.8 oz
feature_bullets: The package dimension of the product is 6.3"L x 4"W x 3.7"H
The package weight of the product is 1.4 pounds
Country of origin is United States
